title: edge banding
description: The process and different kinds of edge banding strips to cover materials with.

title: formulate diets with the feeds to animals
description: Formulate diets and rations to maximise animal growth, reproduction, health, and/or performance.

title: types of strings
description: Vibrating elements that generate sounds in string instruments. They can be classified into two categories, namely the decorative and the wound strings, and they can be made of different materials such as steel, gut, silk or nylon. Winding materials include aluminium, chrome steel, silver, gold and copper.

title: apply horticultural standards and practices
description: Establishes and maintains high horticultural standards and practices; providing direction, training and motivation for the horticultural staff, interns and volunteers.

title: enforce customer's debt repayment
description: monitor customers to pay all debts and amounts due; negotiate return of merchandise.

title: install embossing plates
description: Glue an embossing plate to a copper backing plate and install this plate into the hot plate of the machine. Cut a piece of cardboard as big as the size of the plate and place it in the bed under the plate. Impress, glue, and align the cardboard, which then leaves a design or letters by pressurizing different contact points.

title: control animal movement
description: Direct, control or restrain some or part of an animal's, or a group of animals', movement.

title: responsible gambling
description: The proper behaviour when participating in a gambling game such as how to be aware of others people's reactions and why people act and react as they do.

title: manufacture of wooden barrels
description: The processes involved in the production of wooden barrels such as material selection, shaping, toasting, fitting, planing and sanding.

title: monitor logging operations
description: Ensure that logging operation follow the contractually agreed terms and specified procedures. Strive to solve any problems that arise during the operation. Improve on existing methods and ensure compliance with safety, company, and government regulations.

title: promote sustainability
description: Promote the concept of sustainability to the public, colleagues and fellow professionals through speeches, guided tours, displays and workshops.

title: prioritise emergencies
description: Determine the level of risk of an emergency situation and balance the dispatch of ambulances to emergency situations accordingly.'

title: land use for airport planning
description: Thoroughly understand the principles that govern the use of land for human activities within and surrounding airports; take into consideration the impact on natural resources such as water, soil, nutrients and wildlife.

title: music and video industry

title: car cleaning procedures

title: general principles of food law

title: legal case management
description: The procedures of a legal case from opening to closing, such as the documentation that needs to be prepared and handled, the people involved in different stages of the case, and the requirements that need to be met before the case can be closed.

title: address potential aerodrome hazards
description: Address potential aerodrome hazards such as foreign objects, debris, and wildlife interference.

title: types of veneers
description: The properties and purposes of different kinds of veneers, such as raw, paper backed or reconstituted veneer.

title: lautering process

title: hot vulcanisation

title: ensure regulatory compliance concerning distribution activities
description: Meet the rules, policies and laws that govern transportation and distribution activities.

title: identify damage to buildings
description: Monitor the state of building exteriors in order to identify any possible damage and to assess the nature of the damage and treatment methods.

title: electronics principles
description: The study of electric energy, more specifically electron, control and its prominent principles regarding integrated circuits and electrical systems.

title: mount photos
description: Frame and hang up finished photographs and posters.

title: firmware
description: Firmware is a software program with a read-only memory (ROM) and a set of instructions that is permanently inscribed on a hardware device. Firmware is commonly used in electronic systems such as computers, mobile phones, and digital cameras.

title: wildlife
description: Undomesticated animal species, as well as all plants, fungi and other organisms that grow or live wild in an area without being introduced by humans. Wildlife can be found in all ecosystems such as deserts, forests, rain forests, plains, grasslands and other areas including the most developed urban areas, all have distinct forms of wildlife. Handling of wildlife capture equipment.

title: dairy animal production
description: Understand the life cycles of the animal in relation to milk production and the technical and economical aspects of milk production.

title: fish harvesting methods
description: Knowledge of up-to-date fish harvesting methods.

title: quality standards of ophthalmic equipment
description: The various national or international quality standards for ophthalmic equipment (glasses, lenses, etc) such as ISO 10685-1:2011.

title: product data management
description: The use of software to track all information concerning a product such as technical specifications, drawings, design specifications, and production costs.

title: prepared animal feeds
description: Composition, nutritional specifications and formulas of animal feeds. Feed additives, energy values, nutritional and supplemental needs depending on different species. Feed requirements according to legislation in force.

title: order equipment
description: Source and order new equipment when necessary.

title: centrifugal force
description: Apparent force that draws a rotating body away from the centre of rotation. Application to machines that use centrifugal forces.

title: install rock movement monitoring devices

title: hydrography
description: The scientific discipline that studies and measures the physical features of bodies of water such as oceans, lakes and rivers. It studies the current situation for navigational purposes and predicts change over time.

title: plan shots
description: Plan complicated shots, such as explosions, before shooting.

title: bathymetry
description: The scientific discipline that studies underwater topography.

title: supervise fruit production teams
description: Supervise the fruit production crews by planning, assigning and evaluating their daily activities.

title: place orders for clothing merchandise
description: Order clothing items and accessories from manufacturers and wholesale stores; place orders depending on stock needs and availability.

title: carry out event management
description: Plan and execute all the technical and logistical aspects required for an event to be successful.

title: assist hydrographic surveys
description: Assist in the installation and deployment of hydrographic surveying equipment.

title: assess the care requirements of bovine feet

title: design infrastructure for surface mines

title: organise tree plantations
description: Organise the tree plantations. Grow crops in an efficient way.

title: pre-grind nibs of cocoa

title: starchy plant foods
description: Variety of starchy plant foods that render flour, such as barley, oats, peanuts, potatoes, soybeans, rice, buckwheat, corn, lima beans, rye and chickpeas.

title: call witnesses

title: keep records of passports

title: care for horses

title: prepare intravenous packs

title: operate vibratory feeder in food production
description: Operate vibratory feeder in order to separate beans and grains from shells and waste. A high frequency vibratory feeder gently and evenly feeds the product, such as almonds, into the hard shell cracker without breakage.

description: Operate the cubing machine making sure the correct patterns for sorting and stacking are followed.

title: tend dry-press
description: Tend the dry-press machines used to transform clay or silica into bricks.

title: prepare the restaurant for service

title: stay abreast of wine trends

title: check tickets throughout carriages
description: Check tickets and travel documents while walking through carriages during the journey. Maintain physical stability and service attitude during inspections.

title: provide humanitarian advice

description: Operate machine that carries beans and grains through air-cleaning system to remove foreign matter.

description: Handle and care for working animals. This includes preparation of animal, working environment and equipment, control and monitoring of the animal during work activities, and care afterwards.

description: Propose program priorities and strategies and have the ability to organize national and/or international meetings.

title: neuropathology

description: Cover up film negatives by applying opaque to printing plates, blocking out defections such as blemishes and pinholes.

description: Equipment used for riding horses such as a saddle or stirrups.

title: neuropharmacology

title: horse riding

This is then cut to the appropriate length and the filter is added and wrapped to the cigarette rod with tipping paper.

title: hand gestures

title: imprint circuit design onto wafers
description: Imprint the electronic circuit design onto the wafers through a process known as photolithography. First, wafers are coated with photosensitive chemicals that harden when exposed to UV light. In sealed dark rooms light is shone through the image of the design through a miniaturising lens and on to the coated wafer. When the chemical is washed off the design remains. The wafers are built up layer by layer, repeating the photo etching process in each new layer. Some layers are cooked, some layers ionised by plasma, and some are baked in metal. Each treatment changes the properties for that layer.
